product_name: Swany Touch Tech Arctic Toaster Mittens - Women's
long_description: The waterproof Swany Touch Tec Arctic Toaster mittens combine the warmth of mittens with the dexterity of gloves, and feature a shell material that reflects heat back to the hands to keep them warm.
short_description: The waterproof Swany Touch Tec Arctic Toaster mittens combine the warmth of mittens with the dexterity of gloves, and feature a shell material that reflects heat back to the hands to keep them warm.
